metadata.title: CVE-2024-49859 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:f2fs: fix to check atomic_file in f2fs ioctl interfacesSome f2fs ioctl interfaces like f2fs_ioc_set_pin_file(),f2fs_move_file_range(), and f2fs_defragment_range() missed tocheck atomic_write status, which may cause potential race issue,fix it.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
